pitch.slide1.title: Partnership at Eye Level
pitch.slide1.text: Elite sport thrives with strong partners.
pitch.slide1.body: Bianca Mitterbauer stands for international level, dedication, and clear values. This deck shows how a partnership creates impact.
pitch.slide1.imageAlt: Hero shot of Bianca Mitterbauer playing water polo
pitch.slide2.title: Elite international performance – an exceptional talent in German women's water polo
pitch.slide2.lead: Bianca Mitterbauer is a German national team player and one of the most promising young talents in women's elite sport.
pitch.slide2.profile.paragraph2: She represents Germany's junior national teams (U18 & U20) as well as the senior women's squad.
pitch.slide2.profile.paragraph3: At just 16, Bianca is already a permanent fixture in international competition and one of the most exciting players of her generation in Germany.
pitch.slide2.profile.paragraph4: At club level she competes for Wasserfreunde Spandau 04 Berlin, the most successful women's team in German water polo.
pitch.slide2.profile.paragraph5: The Spandau women are also the first German women's side to compete in the Water Polo Champions League.
pitch.slide2.experience.heading: International experience
pitch.slide2.experience.goal: Bianca's long-term sporting goal is to compete at the Olympic Games in 2028 and 2032.
pitch.slide2.cards.presence.title: National Team Credibility
pitch.slide2.cards.presence.body: Starter for Germany's U18 squad, delivering prime-time exposure at European tournaments.
pitch.slide2.cards.audience.title: Audience Reach
pitch.slide2.cards.audience.body: Blends federation channels, earned media, and live events to put partners in front of engaged fans.
pitch.slide2.cards.discipline.title: Discipline & Consistency
pitch.slide2.cards.discipline.body: Daily elite training and data-informed routines guarantee reliability for campaigns.
pitch.slide2.cards.story.title: Storytelling Potential
pitch.slide2.cards.story.body: From STEM student to international athlete – a modern narrative for value-driven brands.
pitch.slide2.imageAlt: Portrait placeholder of the athlete in the pool
pitch.slide3.title: Reach & Visibility
pitch.slide3.lead: Platforms where your brand shows up with credibility.
pitch.slide3.imageAlt: Dynamic action shot from a water polo match
pitch.slide3.reach.title: Digital Visibility Overview
pitch.slide3.reach.body: Livestreams, federation channels, and earned media keep Bianca visible—the key metrics partners ask for.
pitch.slide3.reach.live.label: Live minutes p.a.
pitch.slide3.reach.live.body: Sportdeutschland.TV, LEN streams, and highlight recaps carry branded call-outs for partners.
pitch.slide3.reach.press.label: Editorial features
pitch.slide3.reach.press.body: National press, DSV newsletters, and university media pick up Bianca's story year-round.
pitch.slide3.reach.social.label: Avg. social reach / month
pitch.slide3.reach.social.body: Instagram, LinkedIn, and team channels provide frequent touchpoints for talent and business audiences.
pitch.slide3.infobox.title: Reliable assets for partners
pitch.slide3.infobox.body: Every activation ships with defined deliverables—from livestream mentions to content drops plus transparent reporting.
pitch.slide4.title: Your Value as a Partner
pitch.slide4.lead: Visibility, credibility, and strong identification in elite sport – across every channel and measurable.
pitch.slide4.benefits.association: Positive brand association built on performance, discipline, and team culture
pitch.slide4.benefits.story: Authentic storytelling and credible content instead of rented ad space
pitch.slide4.benefits.partnership: Long-term partnership with a clear stance in women's elite sport
pitch.slide4.package.label: Leistungspaket
pitch.slide4.package.left.item2: Sponsor mention in social posts & stories
pitch.slide4.package.left.item3: Integration in editorial pieces (news / achievements / tournaments)
pitch.slide4.package.right.item2: Event & match highlights plus replays around international streams
pitch.slide4.kpi.label: Messbarkeit
pitch.slide4.kpis.visibility.label: Monthly impressions (social + website)
pitch.slide4.kpis.reach.label: Reach outside the core community (IG non-follower share)
pitch.slide4.kpis.traffic.label: Average pageviews per month (website)
pitch.slide4.closing: Together we create visibility in the elite sports environment—transparent, premium, and sustainable.
pitch.slide4.imageAlt: Portrait of Bianca Mitterbauer in training gear
pitch.slide5.title: Flexible Models
pitch.slide5.lead: Packages calibrated to objectives and budgets.
pitch.slide5.cards.main.title: Lead Partner
pitch.slide5.cards.main.body: Maximum visibility across every channel, co-created campaigns, exclusivity.
pitch.slide5.cards.project.title: Project Partner
pitch.slide5.cards.project.body: Time-bound activations around events, launches, or content series.
pitch.slide5.cards.junior.title: Next Gen Partner
pitch.slide5.cards.junior.body: Support for youth and community programs with high credibility.
pitch.slide5.imageAlt: Photo of a team strategy session
pitch.slide6.title: Let's Talk
pitch.slide6.text: Together we design a tailored partnership.
